text:
Airfinity | London or Brighton UK | Full Time | Senior Engineer (Data) & Senior Full Stack Engineer| http://airfinity.com

Working to organise and understand the world's event, attendee and sponsor data. Currently hiring for multiple roles in our data engineering team based in London.

We are looking for accomplished engineers looking for their next big challenge.

We are a year old and have secured several rounds with a rapidly expanding team working on our event data products.

Salary Range Â£70-80k + Equity + Benefits, Flexible Working

If you would like to talk please either reach out to me directly and mention HN [james at airfinity .com] or through our Workable page. https://airfinityjobs.workable.com/
